reviewText: My grandson loves this movie. Hes watched it 5 times already and just got it as a present yesterday.
Great product for the price I paid. My son loves Sonic, and he loves watching these episodes.
Always closes every episode with good advice that children heed.
My son loves this movie watches everyday
I love the episodes on this. Great for any Sonic fan.
The boys love it . They watch it all the time. Would recommend for anyone who has kids that like Sonic.

Just a thought ladies and gents...it is more feasible for you to spend the additional $10 (on top of the listed price for this DVD) on the 'Sonic The Hedgehog' complete series DVD set.  My youngest boy (a true Sonic fan) saw this at a local supermarket and asked me for it.  Considering that it's his birthday on Feb. 10th and I knew I was gonna get the DVD box set (through Amazon.com) that has the same episodes, I said "that's a negatory, good buddy!"  If your son or daughter (or you) likes Sonic, just spend the extra duckets for the entire series, not just for 4 episodes.  As I said in the beginning of this 'review,' it's just a thought.
